articles.title: Rare Black Moon solar eclipse takes bite out of sun over South America - Space.com
articles.description: The partial solar eclipse was the first of 2022.
articles.content:
Skywatchers across parts of the Southern Hemisphere were treated to the first partial eclipse of the year today. 
The partial solar eclipse of April 30, one of two happening in 2022, swept over part… [+4359 chars]
